Description: The Heavenly and earthly Trinities; the Holy Family with the infant Christ walking at centre and holding his parents' hands; the Holy Dove and God the Father seen above; in a cartouche, framed with small scenes of the Life of Christ: the Nativity, Flight into egypt, the Holy family at work and the Death of Joseph. Engraving
Bibliographic references: Hollstein / Dutch and Flemish etchings, engravings and woodcuts c.1450-1700 (770) (Wierix)
Mauquoy-Hendrickx 1979 / Les Estampes des Wierix ... catalogue raisonné (471)
Alvin 1866 / Catalogue raisonné de l'oeuvre des trois frères Jan, Jérome et Antoine Wierix (1267)
Acquisition name: Purchased from: A E Evans & Sons
